betterquesting:10.desc:8:
And from the Acorn, Twin Saplings, the two faces of freedom.
The ability to empower others, and the ability to constrain them.
This is the gift of freedom, true freedom. A gift so hard to give.
Will my actions bring forth another Xxeus, another Meatball Man?
That is the price of this gift. A price I alone will be responsible for, and yet one I must give.
I now understand the need for Ascension, the need for freedom.
Only one who has understood the mission, one who has embraced divinity, will be capable of making such a choice, to take on the burden of granting freedom.
If my had journey had been different, if I hadn't witnessed what Xxeus had done by witholding this gift, would I have done the same? Would I have kept the acorn from germinating?
If Destiny is listening, if the Fractallite in charge of Fate is looking upon me know, I thank them. I thank them for the struggle, the pain, the desperation, of laying eyes on the oppressed, the burdened, the imprisoned. If it hadn'd been for them, I would not have the strength to do what I am now doing.
So thank you, thank you, thank you.
